meanings.sent1: The rapscallion snuck into the kitchen and stole some cookies.
meanings.sent2: The town was wary of the rapscallion who always caused trouble.
meanings.sent3: The rapscallion thought it was funny to hide his friend's shoes.
meanings.sent4: The rapscallion's smile was as sly as a fox's.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous rapscallion left a trail of chaos wherever he went.

meanings.sent1: The old man referred to the young troublemaker as a rapscallion.
meanings.sent2: The rapscallion tried to charm his way out of trouble once again.
meanings.sent3: The rapscallion's antics always kept the town entertained.
meanings.sent4: The rapscallion's eyes sparkled with mischief.
meanings.sent5: The notorious rapscallion was finally caught by the authorities.
